outputs.output_descr: The Project focuses on the following: Climate change risks integrated into critical decision-making processes for agricultural management at the local, sub-national and national levels; Agricultural productivity made resilient to the anticipated impacts of climate change; National fiscal, regulatory and development policy revised to promote adaptation responses in the agricultural sector; and  Knowledge and lessons learned compiled and disseminated to support implementation of adaptation measures in agroecological regions I and II in Zambia.

project_descr: Adaptation to the effects of drought and climate change in agro-ecological regions I and II in Zambia.
project_title: Adaptation to Effects of Drought & Climate Change
